name: The Gallows Frequency
description:
The player awakes in a mysterious maze with a bizarre feeling behind there eyes and with only a flashlight and a strange voice coming from a radio. That instructs them its time to play the game.

The name of the game is simple "find the key, find the door and oh yeah dont die" the voice instructs the player.

In The Gallows Frequency player have to navigate a dark maze all the while being hunted by a lumbering monster and suffering from the effects of the gallows frequency itself.

Controls

wasd – movement

mouse controlled look

esc – exit the game

simply download the game it can be installed or run from the exe I would recommend playing in windowed mode for convenience.

Side Note about me:

This is the first game I have released in a long time, I have been making games as a "job" for about 7 years now and went through a dark patch the last couple years where I didnt think anything I did was good enough so I stuck to mostly contract work for other peoples projects.

Thank you so much to everyone I have interacted with in the last few months for giving me the confidence to make games again I can never repay you.

Special thanks to pink0monster for helping me design this game

twitter.com/pink0monster

The bit where I beg for money:

This game is set to pay what you want money is not required but if you would like and have a spare dollar or two it would be greatly apprecated.

I also have a patreon which if you would like to continue to support my game development you can check it out here.

https://www.patreon.com/PodunkStudioz
